name: Ivan's Fear
description:
This is my first game, made by myself. It took me one week to finish it.
This game is dedicated to my friend Ivan from Russia. Happy 18th birthday Ivan!
Game tells us a story of nightmares, which is taking a place in some old house somewhere in Russia.
Gameplay is about 10 minutes. Press E to interact. The game has 3 endings.
Hope you will soil your pants! Enjoy. : )
